interface.name: MethodEntryEvent
interface.javadoc:
Notification of a method invocation in the target VM. This event occurs after entry into the invoked method and before any code has executed. Method entry events are generated for both native and non-native methods.

In some VMs method entry events can occur for a particular thread before its {@link ThreadStartEvent} occurs if methods are called as part of the thread's initialization. EventQueue Robert Field 1.3

Returns the method that was entered.
a {@link Method} which mirrors the method that was entered.
